(C) Water levels: LOW DURING FALL; NO FLOODS TO DEC. 15
(D) Spawning distribution: CHUMS WELL DISTRIBUTED TO WELL ABOVE KINKADE CREEK
(F) Egg digging: DUE TO EXCELLENT DISTRIBUTION, LESS THAN MOST YEARS
